text: IÉSEG School of Management is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 2 places, in Lille and in La Défense.Visite guidée du nouveau bâtiment de l’Iéseg à La Défense It has been established in 1964. IÉSEG is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. ==References== == Further reading == * IÉSEG website Category:1960s establishments in France Category:1964 establishments in Europe Category:Lille Category:Universities in Paris Category:Management
title: IÉSEG School of Management
